dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S110 IS: Veterans Member Business Loan Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Sullivan (for himself and Ms. Hirono) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Credit Union Act to exclude extensions of credit made to veterans from the definition of a member business loan.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Member Business Loan Act.

subsection.text: Section 107A(c) of the Federal Credit Union Act (12 U.S.C. 1757a(c)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in clause (iv), by striking or at the end;
in clause (v), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2)(B)(ii), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (3), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
the term veteran has the meaning given the term in section 101 of title 38, United States Code.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall take effect on the date that is 180 days after the date of enactment of this Act.
